body.name: Lizush Organic Baby Powder - 3 oz. Talc Free Soothing Arrowroot, Calendula, and Cornstarch Baby Powder for Newborn, Babies, and Toddlers

climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: SENSITIVE SKIN: Specially formulated for baby's delicate skin. This organic baby dusting powder absorbs excess moisture and keeps your baby fresh in-between diaper changes while soothing the skin.

FAST ABSORBING: For sensitive and dry skin, this talc-free baby powder formula absorbs moisture effectively, helping to prevent chaffing and discomfort, leaving your baby feeling fresh and comfortable all day.
PLANT-BASED: Made with all-natural ingredients, our corn starch powder for body is made with calendula and kaolin clay, making it an effective solution for calming dry, irritated, delicate skin.

SAFE FOR LITTLE ONES: Formulated from gentle botanicals, you can feel good knowing that this body powder is free from chemicals, synthetic fragrances, or harmful ingredients, and it provides a safe alternative to traditional talc-based powders.

LIZUSH: Discover a wide range of handcrafted bath and body essentials to promote well-being. With our commitment to clean personal care products, we proudly display organic certification 1921001, granted by Pikes Peak Organic Manufacturing in 2022.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Natural Bath & Body Products Lizush is fully committed to creating thoughtful and well-rounded gift sets for all. Every item in these sets is meticulously handcrafted in the USA using the finest ingredients. They are the ultimate choice for an all-natural gift, providing a pampering experience for yourself and the people you cherish.

PURE INGREDIENTS. Naturally sourced from all over the world. Rich in vitamins, minerals, nutrients, and antioxidants. Shea Butter Contains several fatty acids and helps soften, smooth and soothe your skin. Almond Oil is Rich in vitamins A, B, D and E. Great for increasing skin hydration. This oil is distilled from the beautiful marigold flower. Calendula Oil is very mild and great when in contact with the skin.

Chamomile helps relieve itchy, dry, irritated-looking skin and calm redness. Arrowroot Powder helps soothe irritation. This makes for a great ingredient in any skincare routine. Pure Essential Oils may help in relaxing and rejuvenating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this because my nips have been so sore! I’m 6m pregnant and they are really dry to the point I can’t standing nothing touching them. It’s helped so much and I can actually stand to wear a bra again!!! Also the oil for my belly is helping my stretch marks as my baby grows! The lavender is so relaxing and refreshing. I suggest putting it about an hour before bed. It’s helped me sleep some too because of the lavender extract. Will definitely be getting more!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love that it’s organic but my gosh it’s really small 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty well for my cracked hands, so I would guess would work for nipples, as well
reviews.reviewText: I have a baby who is almost three months old and I am breastfeeding. I got this lotion before the baby was born in case my nipples crack, but I haven't needed it yet because my nipples haven't had much for problems. Instead, I have used it for my hands that are extremely cracked from dryness to the point of bleeding from countless cuts. This lotion has not cured me 100%, but it has certainly helped me heal. It is a very good moisturizer. I really like the natural ingredients, the mild smell, and the slightly chunky texture that fades when rubbed. Although I can't say whether it works for my nipples, from my experience with my hands, I can imagine it would work for nipples as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good basic powder
reviews.reviewText: This has to be a much better powder for the baby butt than we typically use - as the store brands tend to not be very good. This powder works well and has no real scent - and that is a good thing - less additives.We love it and the babys bum like it too.Nice powder. Well made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non toxic and nice quality for gifting a new mom or mama to be!
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my friend's shower as part of her gift, she likes the crunchier brands that have clean ingredients- love the handmade aesthetic and the natural ingredients. Non-toxic and packaged nicely. I'd use it myself, and it came giftable the way it was wrapped. I know she'll love it and appreciate it. This brand seems to make a few quality, clean/non-toxic items for post partum moms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Want to say thank you ! + tip for moms below
reviews.reviewText: Felt so special receiving this. Had my third baby 4 months ago was nice to have something special for myself. Also mommas stay tuned for a very useful hack for your babies with the nipple butter! So oil is great smells wonderful feels good and I think it's helped with appearance of my stomach over course of a month. Relaxing and I also dabbed my under arms with it and it actually helps with smell! Now for the hack. Cradle cap an issue? Slather in this nipple butter and kiss it goodbye! My son had a random hidden patch of STUBBORN cradle cap I didnt even know it was cradle cap until further investigating it looked like his scalp was like heavily "dented/textured" I was concerned like what the heck but realized it was cradle cap I tried everything before to only get a couple flakes gone I tried the butter hey if it's for cracked sore nips why wouldn't it work and boy did it WORK. A LOT of it within 5 minutes started to lift 3 days of heavy application it's ALL gone and boy was it worse than I thought he had so many scales coming up I was consistently removing over the 3 days all through out and it helps heal cuts/scratches as well so thankful for this set was beautiful and helped me and my son thank you ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and soothing
reviews.reviewText: Gentle and soothing balm made of natural ingredients.The product has a thick texture that feels more like a paste than a cream. The smell is sweet and a bit strong but quite pleasant.It works nicely to soothe already irritated skin and keep it from getting worse.Even though the product's title informed me of the size of the container (2 oz), I'm still surprised by how small it is.The presentation of the product is lovely, and it would make an adorable gift, but it's a bit too much if you're getting it for personal use, so it would be nice if we could choose between a "personal version" and a "giftable version" of the item.Despite some criticism, the quality of the product is great and it works well.This is a review for [Lizush Organic Diaper Balm - 2 oz. Diaper Cream and Soothing Baby Lotion for Diaper Irritation - Baby Care Products to Moisturize and Relieve Dry, Itchy Skin] [Style: Diaper Balm].

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these post partum and really love them. I use the nipple cream each time I pump and have had no issues. I use the belly oil on my c section scar and i love the natural scent.
